enhanced_by.reason: The isValid method relies on the getValidator method to retrieve the appropriate validator for the given IBAN code.
The isValid method uses the RegexValidator's isValid method to check the format of the IBAN code.
Both isValid and IBANCheckDigit.IBAN_CHECK_DIGIT.isValid methods validate the correctness of an IBAN code, making them suitable for constructing assertions.
The getValidator method can be used to assert the presence and correctness of the validator for a given IBAN code.
